eg.ui

Class EditArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.EditArea

  • public final class EditArea
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the editor view that contains the text area to edit text and the area that shows line numbers. These are contained in a JPanel which is obtained through editAreaPnl().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditArea(boolean isWordwrap, boolean isLineNumbers, java.lang.String font, int fontSize)

      Returns if wordwrap is enabled

    • Constructor Detail

      • EditArea

        public EditArea(boolean isWordwrap,
                boolean isLineNumbers,
                java.lang.String font,
                int fontSize)
        Parameters:
        isWordwrap - true to enable wordwrap
        isLineNumbers - true to show line numbering. Is effectless if wordwrap is enabled
        font - the name of the initial font
        fontSize - the size of the initial font

        public void showLineNumbers()

        Hides line numbers. Invoking this method also annules wordwrap
